official-title.#text: To exempt certain long-term care hospitals operating in a single-hospital MSA from the Medicare threshold payment adjustment policy for long-term care hospitals, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: Defending Rural Access to Long Term Acute Care Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Exemption from threshold payment adjustment policy for certain long-term care hospitals operating in a single-hospital MSA

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall not apply sections 412.534 or 412.536 of title 42, Code of Federal Regulations, to any long-term care hospital operating in a single-hospital MSA (as defined in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Secretary of Health and Human Services

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Defending Rural Access to Long Term Acute Care Act of 2013/s:2/ss:b

term.#tail: means an entity that meets the following criteria on the date of the enactment of this Act:
term.#text: long-term care hospital operating in a single-hospital MSA

header.#text: Long-Term care hospital operating in a single-Hospital MSA defined

text.#text: The entity is a long-term care hospital as defined in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , but is not a long-term care hospital described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 1861(ccc) of the Social Security Act
section 1886(d)(1)(B)(iv)(II) of the Social Security Act

text.#text: The entity is located in a Metropolitan Statistical Area (as defined by the Office of Management and Budget in OMB Bulletin 13–01 published February 28, 2013) that has only one subsection (d) hospital (as defined in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 1886(d)(2)(D) of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: applies to long-term care hospitals for cost reporting periods beginning on or after October 1, 2013.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Defending Rural Access to Long Term Acute Care Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a
